FuncDef:
The l2-multicast-channel command displays the global or VSI channel view.
The undo l2-multicast-channel command deletes a channel group.
By default, the global or VSI channel view is not displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VSI to be configured with a channel.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create a global or VSI channel, run the l2-multicast-channel command to enter the global or VSI channel view first.
Prerequisites
A VSI has been created before you use the l2-multicast-channel vsi command.
